item.title: The Abu Dhabi First Class Lounge & Spa has been opened by Etihad Airways
item.description:
Etihad Airways has opened a new flagship First Class Lounge & Spa in Terminal 3 of Abu Dhabi International Airport. This space highlights the airline’s dedication to offering exceptional and desirable hospitality. Inspired by top-tier hotels, private clubs, and fine dining establishments, the lounge provides an exclusive environment. It features unmatched design, style, comfort, world-class dining, and personalized beauty and relaxation services. The lounge offers 16 distinct zones for guests to unwind, recharge, and enjoy entertainment in complete luxury before their flights...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-abu-dhabi-first-class-lounge-spa-has-been-opened-by-etihad-airways/

item.title: ADIB introduces the Spice credit card specifically for Non-Resident Indians and Non-Resident Pakistanis
item.description:
Source: ADIB. The new Spice Card offers a range of cashbacks if the owner hits a minimum spend. Abu Dhabi Islamic Bank (ADIB) has introduced the Spice Card, a new product designed specifically for non-resident Indians (NRIs) and non-resident Pakistanis (NRPs) living in the UAE. The ADIB Spice Card provides NRIs and NRPs with opportunities to save money through a variety of competitive offers and discounts. These include cashback rewards of 9% on dining, 7% on supermarket purchases, 4% on fuel, and 1% on utility bills...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/adib-introduces-the-spice-credit-card-specifically-for-non-resident-indians-and-non-resident-pakistanis/
